application.javafxapp

Class JavaFXAppController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.javafxapp.JavaFXAppController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PaneReplacer, PaneReplacerShortened, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class JavaFXAppController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, PaneReplacerShortened
    Main Controller of the JavaFX JavaFXApp program.

    Sets Panes as the borderPane's CENTER: via setting a child Pane to the parent parentContainer.

    Note: implements Initializable in order to set the observers binded to the progressBar and ColorPickerApp.getColorPicked().

    • Field Detail

      • progressBarDoubleNumber

        private static final NumberProperty progressBarDoubleNumber
        This editable field defines a double number that is binded to the progressBar via observation.

        Edit this number with NumberProperty.setNumber(double) to set a value to the progressBar.

      • setPane

        public void setPane(java.lang.String pathToFXML)
        This method sets the new Pane to be shown on the CENTER of the borderPane and updates the replaceAblePane accordingly.

        Note: there is no Animation in this method.

        Specified by:
        setPane in interface PaneReplacerShortened
        Parameters:
        pathToFXML - path to the .fxml of the pane the user wishes to show.
